com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast

Class VisitingBroadcaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.AbstractBroadcaster
      • com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.VisitingBroadcaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Broadcaster

    public final class VisitingBroadcaster
extends AbstractBroadcaster
    A broadcaster that can replay the broadcast chain on demand.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.AbstractBroadcaster

        public VisitingBroadcaster(Broadcaster broadcaster)
        Creates a new VisitingBroadcaster and calls AbstractBroadcaster.chain(Broadcaster) on this instance, passing in the given Broadcaster.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast(Broadcastable broadcastable)
        Description copied from interface: Broadcaster
        Broadcasts the given event (syntax unit).
        Parameters:
        broadcastable - The Broadcastable syntax unit.

      • visit

        public void visit(Broadcaster broadcaster,
                  Status status)
        Calls Broadcastable.propagateBroadcast(Broadcaster, Status) on the top unit using the given Broadcaster and status.

        Once this method is called the target unit is locked in so that subsequent calls will always propagate from the same starting point.

        Parameters:
        broadcaster - Propagate with this broadcaster.
        status - Only propagate the broadcast of units with this status.
